projects.title: TaskFlow Manager
projects.shortDescription: A productivity web app that helps teams track tasks and collaboration.

longDescription.intro: TaskFlow Manager is a full-stack project management tool designed for remote teams.
longDescription.motivation: We wanted a lightweight alternative to existing tools that felt too bloated or overpriced.
longDescription.process: We planned user flows, built UI wireframes, iterated on API design, and deployed staging builds for testing.
longDescription.futureAdditions: Slack integration, AI scheduling, Kanban templates, multi-tenant support.
longDescription.technologyHighlights: React, TypeScript, Prisma, TailwindCSS, PostgreSQL, Vercel hosting.

projects.title: EcoRoute Navigator
projects.shortDescription: App suggesting eco-friendly routes using live traffic and transit data.

longDescription.intro: EcoRoute Navigator is a sustainability-focused travel assistant.
longDescription.motivation: Fuel prices and climate concerns motivated us to develop greener travel logic.
longDescription.process: We experimented with graph algorithms, transit APIs, offline caching, and heuristic route scoring.
longDescription.futureAdditions: Carbon scoring badges, smartwatch support, voice navigation, social eco challenges.
longDescription.technologyHighlights: React Native, Expo, Mapbox SDK, Firebase messaging, GraphQL backend.

projects.title: RecipeVerse AI
projects.shortDescription: AI recipe assistant turning leftover ingredients into creative meals.

longDescription.intro: RecipeVerse AI brings creativity into kitchens through intelligent ingredient-based meal suggestions.
longDescription.motivation: Food waste inspired us â€” we wanted a system that helps users reuse what they have.
longDescription.process: We curated datasets, built prompt-generated outputs, evaluated flavor scoring, and implemented dynamic filtering.
longDescription.futureAdditions: Community recipe uploading, calorie tracking, multilingual personalization, premium AI kitchen tutor.
longDescription.technologyHighlights: Next.js, Python AI inference, OpenAI API, MongoDB, Chakra UI.
